data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reia, Lais, Benine, Ricardo C. (2019): A new species of Hemigrammus Gill 1858 (Characiformes: Characidae) from the upper Rio Negro, Amazon basin, Brazil. Zootaxa 4555 (3): 407-415, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4555.3.9|5 occurrences
